explore.title: Timetable
explore.poiTimetableDescription: The timetable visualizes frequent visits of selected POIs for each weekday. Select an identified frequently visited place and explore when you have visited it in the past.

tracking.title: Tracking
tracking.notSupported: This platform doesn't support background location tracking
tracking.androidBatteryHint: In order for this app to work correctly, you should disable battery optimizations in the settings for this app. For more information check this site
tracking.alwaysAllowHint: For best tracking results enable always allow for this app in your
tracking.unpauseReminderQuestion: Should we remind you to turn tracking back on again?
tracking.removeConsentConfirmationText: By doing this the app will stop tracking your location.
tracking.informedConsentText:
The Simport Learning App collects your location data to enable visualization, aggregation (identify frequently visited locations), and analyzation (estimate work and home location, create predictions) of your data, even when the app is closed or not in use.

This data never leaves your local device (i.e., phone or tablet) unless you export it manually – we do not upload or save the location data collected to a server. All processing is done locally on the device.

notification.predictionText: We think you will visit {{ value }} in the next hour.
notification.inferencesFoundText: We're now able to draw {{ value }} conclusions from your location history
notification.backgroundGeolocationText: Your location is currently tracked in order to show potential inferences.
notification.trackingUnpausedText: The scheduled pause of the location tracking has ended. Please tap here and restart tracking in the app's menu.

confirm.showLocationServiceSettings: Location services disabled. Would you like to open app settings?
confirm.grantLocationPermissionSettings: App requires always on location permission. Please grant permission in settings.

info.work: We assume you are working at {{ address }} with {{ confidence }}.
info.home: We assume you are living at {{ address }} with {{ confidence }}.
info.poi: We assume you are regularly visiting {{ address }}.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.controllerTitle: 1. Name and address of the responsible controller
privacyPolicy.controllerInfoText:
The responsible controller as defined in the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other national data protection laws of the EU member states as well as other data protection-related provisions is: Westfälische Wilhelms-Universität Münster (WWU) / University of Münster (WWU) represented by its Rector, Prof Dr Johannes Wessels, Schlossplatz 2, 48149 Münster, Germany
tel.: + 49 251 83-0
email: verwaltung@uni-muenster.de
privacyPolicy.responsibleInfoText:
If you have any questions about the project, please contact the responsible staff member:
Mr. Sven Heitmann
Institute for Geoinformatics
Heisenbergstraße 2
48149 Münster
email: sven.heitmann@uni-muenster.de
privacyPolicy.dataProtectionOfficerTitle: 2. Contact data of the Data Protection Officer
privacyPolicy.dataProtectionOfficerText:
You can contact the Data Protection Officer at:
Data Protection Office
Schlossplatz 2, 48149 Münster
tel.: + 49 251 83-22446
email: Datenschutz@uni-muenster.de
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingTitle: 3. Data processing in connection with using the SIMPORT Learning App
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingsScopeText: The following personal data is processed by the SIMPORT Learning App:
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingsScope:
(1) Location data (only locally on your device)
(2) Other data entered by the user into the app
(3) Frequency of use and user behaviour
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingPurposesText: The processing of the above-mentioned personal data serves the usage, operation and statistical analysis within the SIMPORT Learning App. The aim is to visualize your location data. For this purpose, the app collects and stores your location data in a database on your device. The collected location history can be visualized on a map. Additionally, the location history is aggregated to identify places you visit frequently.
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingLegalBasisTitle: c) Legal basis for processing personal data
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingLegalBasisText: Your consent serves as the legal basis for processing your personal data listed above by the University of Münster, as stipulated by Art. 6 (1, 1a) GDPR and, if applicable, Art. 9 (2a) GDPR.
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingFurtherRecipientsTitle: d) Further recipients of your personal data
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingFurtherRecipientsText:
Some elements of your personal data listed above is forwarded to the following recipients within and outside the University of Münster:
In principle, your personal data will only be disclosed insofar as the University of Münster is obliged by law or due to a court or official order. The legal basis for this is Art 6 (1, 1c) GDPR.
The SIMPORT Learning App relies on an external service to provide visualizations of the location data collected about you. In order to display your location history on a map, the App uses map tiles provided by CARTO. Map tiles are the background images you see when looking at a map, consisting for example of roads in a city. Requests for map tiles sent by the SIMPORT Learning App to CARTO include your device’s IP address as well as the region for which data is requested. Please refer to https://carto.com/privacy/ for information on how CARTO processes this data.
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingDurationStorageDataTitle: e) Duration of storage of personal data
privacyPolicy.dataProcessingDurationStorageDataText: Your data specified under No. 3 will be stored on your device for the duration that you are using the SIMPORT Learning App. You can withdraw your consent at any time by deleting the app from your device, which also deletes the mentioned data.
privacyPolicy.accessStorageTitle: 5. Access and storage of information in terminal equipment
privacyPolicy.accessStorageText:
By using the SIMPORT Learning app, information such as the IP address can be accessed or information such as cookies can be stored in your terminal device. This access and storage may involve further processing of personal data within the meaning of the GDPR.
In the event that such access or storage is technically necessary to provide the app, this is done on the basis of section 25 (1, 1), (2, No. 2) TTDSG.
In the event that such access or storage serves other purposes, this is done on the basis of section 25 (1) TTDSG only with your consent in accordance with Art. 6 (1a) GDPR.

You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority. The responsible supervisory authority is the Landesbeauftragte für Datenschutz und Informationsfreiheit Nordrhein-Westfalen, Postfach 20 04 44, 40102 Düsseldorf, tel: +49 211 / 38424-0, email: poststelle@ldi.nrw.de
privacyPolicy.changesText: We may modify this privacy policy at any time, at our discretion, and modifications are effective upon being posted here. Such modifications will not change the scope of our collection or use of your personal data collected before such modifications. The date on which this privacy policy was last revised is identified below. If we make material changes to how we treat your personal data, we will also ask for your consent to such changes through a dialog in the “Tracking” menu of this app.
privacyPolicy.dateTitle: Effective Date of the Privacy Policy

licenses.title: Licenses
licenses.subtitle: Software that we use to create this app

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.general:
The Simport Learning App aims to help you get a better understanding of what privacy means in the context of location data. For this reason, it collects your location data and visualizes it.

This app is developed as part of the Simport research project funded by the German Federal Ministry of Education and Research. You can learn more about the project at https://simport.net.

You can find the source code of this app at https://github.com/sitcomlab/simport-learning-app, licensed under the MIT License. We always welcome new contributors.
